title: What is Apache Ignite
message: Apache Ignite is a high-performance, integrated and distributed in-memory platform for computing and transacting on large-scale data sets in real-time, orders of magnitude faster than possible with traditional disk-based or flash technologies.

Apache Ignite is designed to deliver uncompromised performance for a wide set of in-memory computing use cases from high performance computing, to the industry most advanced data grid, highly available service grid, and streaming.

title: What is Apache Ignite Web Console
message: Apache Ignite Web Console is a powerful tool for configuration and management of your clusters.
With Apache Ignite Web Console you can:
• Import domain model from database or describe it manually
• Preview generated XML and Java code in browser
• Download fully functional Maven project with generated XML and Java code

title: Cluster screen
message: In cluster configuration you can follow next steps:
• See and download generated project for configured cluster on Summary screen
